page.title: 18Church Brigade:Hadleigh
page.content: CHURCH LADS AND CHURCH GIRLS BRIGADE At Brigade we do all sorts of things. We play instruments like the Cornet, Bell-Lyre,Cymbals,Base Drum,Tenor Drum and Side Drum. We go to Brigade every friday night at 7.00p.m. until 9.00p.m. We go to church once every month in Layham. On May 11th. we went to Stafford for a competition. We have only been formed for about a year and we won three cups. One for the best band, one for runner- up drummers and runner-up uniform. We are having a jumble sale on the 6th. July.
